sent.orig: Depend upon Abstractions. Do not depend upon concretions.
sent.trans: 依赖抽象，不要依赖具体。

sent.orig: It will depend on you, and it could depend on no better man.
sent.trans: 这得要靠你了，你是最可靠的人。

sent.orig: You may depend on his coming(depend on him to come).
Depend upon abstractions. Do not depend upon concrete classes.
sent.trans: 要依赖抽象，不要依赖具体类。

sent.orig: A. High level modules should not depend upon low level modules. Both should depend upon abstractions.
sent.trans: 上层模块应该不依赖于下层模块，它们都依赖于抽象。
